title: 2014년 Held 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Held. 판결일: 2014-05-02. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: James M. Held v. The Pike Company, and Third-Party Plaintiffs-Respondents. CME Associates, Inc., Third-Party
**판결일**: 2014-05-02
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

**판사**: Carni, Centra, Lindley, Peradotto, Whalen

## 인용

- 117 A.D.3d 1500
- 984 N.Y.S.2d 903

## 판결문 요약


— Appeal from an order of the Supreme Court, Erie County (Patrick H. NeMoyer, J.), entered January 14, 2013. The order, among other things, denied the motion of third-party defendant for summary judgment dismissing the amended third-party complaint.
It is hereby ordered that the order so appealed from is unanimously affirmed without costs for reasons stated in the decision at Supreme Court.
Present — Centra, J.P, Peradotto, Carni, Lindley and Whalen, JJ.
...
